mapper.select: select id, police_type,police_num as actual_police_num, police_post_id as station_post_id, creation_date, update_date, '0' as differ_police_num, '0' as get_police_num, '0' as is_lack, '0' as police_station_id from calculation_police_post where police_type = #{policeType}

select id, police_type,police_num as actual_police_num, police_station_id as station_post_id, creation_date, update_date, '0' as differ_police_num, '0' as get_police_num, '0' as is_lack, '0' as police_station_id from calculation_police_station where police_type = #{policeType}

select a.police_station_id,b.police_type,b.police_post_id as station_post_id, ROUND(a.num*b.police_num,0) as get_police_num, c.actual_police_num,(c.actual_police_num-ROUND(a.num*b.police_num,0)) as differ_police_num, (case when c.actual_police_num=ROUND(a.num*b.police_num,0) then 1 else 0 end) as is_lack from(select a.police_station_id,sum((case when a.case_id=1 then round((0.5*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=2 then round((0.2*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=3 then round((0.3*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) end)) as num from calculation_detail a left join (select case_id,sum(case_num) as total_num from calculation_detail GROUP BY case_id) b on b.case_id=a.case_id where a.case_id <4 GROUP BY a.police_station_id) as a join (select police_num,police_post_id,police_type from calculation_police_post where police_post_id=#{stationPostId} and police_type=#{policeType}) as b left join calculation c on c.police_station_id=a.police_station_id and c.station_post_id=b.police_post_id

select a.police_station_id,c.station_post_id,c.police_type, c.actual_police_num, ROUND(a.total_num*b.police_num,0) as get_police_num, (c.actual_police_num-ROUND(a.total_num*b.police_num,0)) as differ_police_num, (case when c.actual_police_num=ROUND(a.total_num*b.police_num,0) then 1 else 0 end) as is_lack from(select a.police_station_id, sum(a.total_num ) as total_num from (select a.police_station_id,a.case_id, (case when a.case_id=4 then round((0.36*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=5 then round((0.1*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=6 then round((0.2*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=7 then round((0.17*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=8 then round((0.17*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) end) as total_num from calculation_detail a left join (select case_id,sum(case_num) as total_num from calculation_detail where case_id >= 4 and case_id <=8 GROUP BY case_id) b on b.case_id=a.case_id where a.case_id >= 4 and a.case_id <=8 GROUP BY a.police_station_id,a.case_id) as a left join police_station c on c.id=a.police_station_id GROUP BY a.police_station_id) as a join (select police_num,police_post_id,police_type from calculation_police_post where police_post_id=#{stationPostId} and police_type=#{policeType}) b left join calculation c on c.police_station_id=a.police_station_id where c.station_post_id=#{stationPostId}

select a.police_station_id,d.station_post_id,d.police_type,d.actual_police_num, ROUND((a.total_num+b.num)*c.police_num,0) as get_police_num, (d.actual_police_num-ROUND((a.total_num+b.num)*c.police_num,0)) as differ_police_num, (case when d.actual_police_num=ROUND((a.total_num+b.num)*c.police_num,0) then 1 else 0 end) as is_lack from (select a.police_station_id, sum(a.total_num)*0.5 as total_num from (select a.police_station_id,a.case_id, (case when a.case_id=4 then round((0.36*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=5 then round((0.1*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=6 then round((0.2*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=7 then round((0.17*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=8 then round((0.17*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) end) as total_num from calculation_detail a left join (select case_id,sum(case_num) as total_num from calculation_detail where case_id>=4 and case_id<=8 GROUP BY case_id) b on b.case_id=a.case_id where a.case_id>=4 and a.case_id <= 8 GROUP BY a.police_station_id,a.case_id) as a left join police_station c on c.id=a.police_station_id GROUP BY a.police_station_id) as a left join (select a.police_station_id,sum((case when a.case_id=1 then round((0.5*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=2 then round((0.2*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) when a.case_id=3 then round((0.3*a.case_num/b.total_num),4) end))*0.5 as num from calculation_detail a left join (select case_id,sum(case_num) as total_num from calculation_detail GROUP BY case_id) b on b.case_id=a.case_id where a.case_id <4 GROUP BY a.police_station_id) as b on b.police_station_id=a.police_station_id join (select police_num,police_post_id,police_type from calculation_police_post where police_post_id=#{stationPostId} and police_type=#{policeType}) c left join calculation d on d.police_station_id=a.police_station_id where d.station_post_id=#{stationPostId} and d.police_type=#{policeType}
select * from calculation where police_type=#{policeType} order by update_date desc limit 1

select a.police_station_id,a.station_post_id,a.police_type, a.actual_police_num, (case when b.case_num/365>=25 then '19' else '12' end) as get_police_num, (a.actual_police_num-(case when b.case_num/365>=25 then '19' else '12' end)) as differ_police_num, is_lack from (select * from calculation where police_type=#{policeType} and station_post_id=#{stationPostId}) a left join calculation_detail b on b.police_station_id=a.police_station_id where b.case_id=4

select a.police_station_id,a.station_post_id,a.police_type, a.actual_police_num, (case when b.case_num/365 > 30 then '3' when b.case_num/365 < 20 then '2' else '1' end) as get_police_num, (a.actual_police_num-(case when b.case_num/365 > 30 then '3' when b.case_num/365 < 20 then '2' else '1' end)) as differ_police_num, is_lack from (select * from calculation where police_type=#{policeType} and station_post_id=#{stationPostId}) a left join calculation_detail b on b.police_station_id=a.police_station_id where b.case_id=4

select a.police_station_id,a.station_post_id,a.police_type,a.actual_police_num, round(b.total_num*c.cnum,0) as get_police_num, (a.actual_police_num-round(b.total_num*c.cnum,0)) as differ_police_num,is_lack from calculation a left join (select a.police_station_id,sum((case when a.case_id=7 then (a.case_num/b.total_num)*0.3 when a.case_id=8 then (a.case_num/b.total_num)*0.3 when a.case_id=9 then (a.case_num/b.total_num)*0.4 end)) as total_num from calculation_detail a left join (select sum(case_num) as total_num,case_id from calculation_detail where case_id>=7 and case_id<=9 GROUP BY case_id) b on b.case_id=a.case_id where a.case_id>=7 and a.case_id<=9 GROUP BY a.police_station_id) b on b.police_station_id=a.police_station_id join (select police_num as cnum from calculation_police_post where police_post_id=#{stationPostId}) c where a.police_type=#{policeType} and a.station_post_id=#{stationPostId}

select a.police_station_id,c.station_post_id,c.police_type, c.actual_police_num, round((a.pnum*b.num),0) as get_police_num, (c.actual_police_num-round((a.pnum*b.num),0)) as differ_police_num,is_lack from (select a.police_station_id,(a.dnum/b.cnum) as pnum from (select sum(get_police_num) as dnum,police_station_id from calculation where police_type=1 GROUP BY police_station_id) a join (select sum(get_police_num) as cnum from calculation where police_type=1) b) a join (select (a.totatl_num-b.num1-c.num2-d.num3-e.num4-f.num5)as num from (select sum(police_num) as totatl_num from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id>0) a join (select sum(police_num) as num1 from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id=6) b join (select sum(police_num) as num2 from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id=7) c join (select sum(police_num) as num3 from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id=8) d join (select sum(police_num) as num4 from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id=9) e join (select sum(police_num) as num5 from calculation_police_post where police_type=2 and police_post_id=10) f) b left join calculation c on c.police_station_id=a.police_station_id where c.station_post_id=#{stationPostId} and c.police_type=#{policeType}
select a.*,b.police_station_name from calculation a left join police_station b on b.id=a.police_station_id where a.police_type=#{policeType} and a.station_post_id=#{stationPostId} order by a.id
